contents.content: [{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "You there","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:43"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "YEP !!!!(ΦωΦ)/","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Oooh so rare~","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "LINDA Chan PMing me on iM","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Why you looking for NEKO all of a sudden","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "07_CatXD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "I'm at work now, can't call you. Have something to tell you","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:45"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "What the matter (Φ∀Φ)","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:45"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Wanna eat Ramen with NEKO??","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:45"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "07_CatXD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:45"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Last time a fan recommended one that only hardcore ramen nerds know","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:46"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Ah but we can't leave AROMA Chan alone at home for too long","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:46"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "A female reporter came to see our boss. She said she wanted to do an interview about UV, but she kept asking stuff about you and PAFF. I feel like she is already suspecting that PAFF is hiding in your home","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "All in all, I took a picture first. Do you know this woman?","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:49"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "[Linda has sent a photo.]","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:49"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "08_CatQQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "NOPE, not at all","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "What do we do","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "AHHHHHHH","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Do I need to tell AROMA chan","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Telling PAFF will only make her worry more, right? Her memory is still very messed up. It's best that we don't stimulate her anymore","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "If things really get out of hand, we'll ask that bar owner for help. He seems like a pretty nice person","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Yeah...","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "In short, when you guys go out these days, be careful. If it would attract too much attention, just don't do it","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Okay","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Thanks LINDA Chan","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Love ya QQ","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "That's it for now... I'm still more used to speaking on the phone. All this notification stuff... You really are noisy-AF","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:54"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "08_CatQQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:54"}]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "NEKO","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:43"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "にゃにー(ΦωΦ)/","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "てか！！！！","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "LINDAっちがIMでメッセ送ってきた！？","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "なになにー？NEKOに何か用事？","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "07_CatXD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "この前ファンの子に穴場教えてもらったよん","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:46"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "でもAROMAっちをあんまり長くひとりぼっちにはできないよ～","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:46"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "女の記者がうちに来てUVにインタビューしたいとか言ってたんだけど、ずっとあんたとPAFFの話ばっかしてる。PAFFがあんたの家にいるってバレてるんだと思う","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "写真撮ったから送る。この人知ってる？","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:49"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "[Lindaが写真を送信しました]","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:49"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "08_CatQQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "知らないなー","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "どしよ","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "どしよ！？！？！？！","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "AROMAっちに言った方がいいかな！？","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "PAFFに話しても心配させるだけだと思う。まだ記憶が錯乱してるんでしょ。あんまり刺激しない方がいい","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "マジでヤバそうだったら、あのバーのオーナーに頼めばいい。ぱっと見悪いやつじゃなさそうだし","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "うんうん……","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "とにかく、家から出る時は気を付けて。あんまり周りの注意を引かないように","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "わかった","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "ありがとLINDAっち","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "らぶゆー泣","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "とりあえずこんな感じで……やっぱ電話の方がいいわ。通知がピコピコうるさい……てかあんたがうるさい……","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:54"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "08_CatQQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:54"}]

"上次粉絲有推薦一間很少人知道ㄉ","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:46"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "不過不能放AROMA醬一ㄍ人在家太久ㄛ","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:46"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "有個女記者跑來找我們老大，說是想做UV的採訪，但一直在問PAFF和妳的事。我覺得她應該已經在懷疑PAFF是不是就在妳家了","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "總之我先拍了照片，妳認識這個女的嗎？","UserName": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "和PAFF講只會讓她擔心吧，她的記憶還很混亂，別刺激她比較好","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "真的不行就請那個酒吧的老闆幫忙吧，他看起來人不錯","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "恩恩...","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": 03:54"}]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "자리에 있음?","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:43"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "있음!!!!(ΦωΦ)/","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "신기하다!","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "LINDA 짱이 IM으로 메시지를 보내다니","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "갑자기 무슨 일이야??","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "07_CatXD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:44"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "출근 중이라 통화는 못 함. 할 얘기가 있어.","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:45"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "뭐야. 뭔데뭔데(Φ∀Φ)","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:45"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "NEKO랑 라면 머그러 가는 거??","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:45"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "07_CatXD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:45"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "예전에 팬 하나가 알려줬는데 알려지지 않은 숨은 맛집이 있음!","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:46"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "그래도 AROMA 짱 혼자 집에 오래 두면 조금 곤란한데","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:46"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "어떤 여기자가 우리 사장을 찾아왔어. UV 인터뷰하고 싶다고. 그런데 자꾸 PAFF랑 네 얘길 묻더라. 촉이 뭔가 PAFF가 이미 너네 집에 있다고 의심하는 것 같아.","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "사진 찍어놨어. 이 여자 아는 사람임?","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:49"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "[Linda 님이 사진을 전송했습니다]","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:49"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "08_CatQQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "모르는 사람인데","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "어떠케","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "닝길 ㅓㅐㅁㄴㄷ랮 ","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "AROMA 짱한테 말해야 하나?","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:50"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "PAFF한테 말하면 걱정밖에 더 하겠냐. 기억도 아직 제대로 안 돌아왔는데 괜한 자극 안 주는 게 더 나을 듯.","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "영 안되겠으면 그 술집 사장한테 부탁해봐. 사람 괜찮은 것 같던데.","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "응...","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:51"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "어쨌든 너희들 외출할 때 조심해. 너무 이목이 끌리는 일 같은 건 아예 하지도 말고","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "알았어","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "LINDA 짱 고마워","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "완전 사랑행","Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:52"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "사랑하던지 말던지. 역시 난 직접 말로 하는 통화가 더 편하다. 계속 메시지는 못 보내겠다... 난리 좀 치지 마","UserName": "Linda","Avatar": "Linda_os_01","Time": "PM 03:54"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "08_CatQQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "neko_os_01","Time": "PM 03:54"}]
